name: Holiday (travel/accommodation)
description: Emission intensity of supply chain in GBP spend on: holiday in the uk/ holiday abroad/ room hire. In actual prices in Â£s and including VAT. Provided by BEIS/DEFRA in the official report on GHG Emissions of the UK between 1996-2018. Where source emission factors are identical across a variety of activities they have been grouped to avoid confusion - details are documented in the OEFDB data guidance.
